# Die Zukunft — llms.txt

> A Swiss political party for structural transformation in the age of AI, robotics, and life sciences.

## About

Die Zukunft (The Future) is a Swiss political party founded in Basel. We propose an upgrade of the social contract: basic income as stability, digital sovereignty by design, re-industrialisation via robotics, and trust-based life science modernisation.

Our positioning: "Prosperity instead of scarcity thinking. Security instead of fear. Sovereignty instead of dependency."

We are not left, not right — we are future-ready. We reject ideological labels and instead apply pragmatic decision criteria to every policy question.
